Dead pigs. MIKAELA: Yuck.

Archeologists found these unexplained markings

Shot in 1932.

So, tell me, how did they end up all drawing the same things?
translation.es: ULTRASECRETO Dime. ¿Cómo dibujaron todos las mismas cosas?

Robots in disguise, hiding here all along.

translation.en: that I was obsessed.
Me. Can you imagine that?

Whatever the Energon source is,

- So, it comes before them. - Correct.

Actually, I am.
Let me out.

- What is it, a Decepticon? - Yeah.
- And you're training him? - I'm trying to.
I spent my whole adult life combing the planet for aliens,

- Earth. - Earth?

My father, he was a wheel, the first wheel.

- No. - Nothing.

translation.en: Bollocks.
My boosters are fried.
I think we can help each other.
You know things I don't know. I know things you don't know, I do.

translation.en: I don't think he knows anything. Honestly, I don't.
translation.es: No creo que él sepa nada. De verdad.

translation.en: I could do this all day. It comes in waves, these vivid symbols.
translation.es: Yo puedo hacer esto todo el día. Los símbolos me vienen en olas.

translation.en: They're symbols, but they're in my mind. You see, all this is in my mind
translation.es: Son símbolos, pero están en mi mente

Him and someone called the Fallen. The Fallen? I know him.
translation.es: - Él y El Caído. - ¿El Caído? Lo conozco.

I remember now, for the Dagger's Tip, and the key.

translation.es: ¿La Punta de la Daga? ¿De qué hablas? No hay tiempo de explicar. ¡Agárrense bien! ¡Esténse quietos o morirán!

translation.en: No time to explain. Hold on, everybody. Stay still or you'll die.
translation.es: No hay tiempo de explicar. ¡Agárrense bien! ¡Esténse quietos o morirán!

translation.en: Well, that wasn't so bad.
translation.es: Estoy bien. No estuvo tan mal.

translation.en: I just hope we're still on the right planet.

translation.en: Hey, that freaking hurt.
Oh, my God.
Oh, God.
Oh, my God, what a beautiful face.
This would be a perfect moment, except you landed on my testicles.
translation.es: Sería un momento perfecto, pero caíste sobre mis testículos.

translation.en: Please, get off.
God, my balls.
Sam!
Where are we? Simmons! Hey! Yeah!
Oh, my God. Oh, my God. What is this? It's Vegas.
translation.es: Dios mío. ¿Qué es esto? ¡Es Las Vegas!

translation.en: - SAM: You guys okay? - MIKAELA: Yeah.
Hey, I think we're in Vegas.
That really, really hurt. You're just lucky that I didn't get hurt!
translation.es: Me dolió mucho. ¡Tuviste suerte de que no me lastimé!

translation.en: People could have gotten killed, okay? And if I would have gotten hurt,
translation.es: ¡Nos podíamos haber matado! Y si me hubiera lastimado,

translation.en: - you would have heard... - Shut up.
I told you I was opening a space bridge. It's the fastest way to travel to Egypt.
translation.es: Les dije que iba a abrir un puente espacial para ir a Egipto.

translation.en: When did you... When did you tell us? You didn't tell us anything.
You didn't tell us anything. Why are we in Egypt?
translation.es: No nos dijiste nada. ¿Por qué estamos en Egipto?

translation.en: Don't you get snippy with me, fleshling. You were duly informed.
translation.es: ¡No te me pongas insolente, humanito! ¡Te informé debidamente!

translation.en: Can you just stop for a second? Can you focus?
Can you tell us why we're in Egypt
translation.es: ¿Nos puedes decir por qué estamos en Egipto

translation.en: so we can all have a little bit of semblance of peace of mind?
translation.es: para que todos tengamos un poco de paz?

translation.en: This planet was visited by our race once before,
translation.es: Nuestra raza ya había visitado este planeta antes.

translation.en: by our earliest ancestors, millennia ago.
They were on an exploratory mission to harvest Energon,
the lifeblood of our race.
translation.es: la energía vital de nuestra raza.

translation.en: Without it, we'll all perish, oxidize and rust, like my wretched self.
translation.es: ¡Sin él, todos pereceremos, oxidados, como el desdichado de mí!

translation.en: Do you have any idea what it's like to slowly fall apart and die?
translation.es: ¿Saben lo que se siente desbaratarse lentamente y morir?

translation.en: Let's not get episodic, okay, old- timer?
Beginning, middle, end. Facts. Details. Condense. Plot. Tell it.
translation.es: Principio, mitad, final. Hechos. Detalles. Condensa. Trama. Cuenta.

translation.en: Somewhere buried in this desert, our ancestors built a great machine.
translation.es: Enterrada en el desierto hay una máquina hecha por nuestros ancestros.

translation.en: It harvests Energon by destroying suns.
- Destroy suns? - You mean blow them up?
Yes. You see, in the beginning,
there were seven Primes, our original leaders.
translation.es: había siete Primes, nuestros líderes originales.

translation.en: And they set out into the universe, seeking distant suns to harvest.
translation.es: Se lanzaron al universo en busca de soles que cosechar.

translation.en: The Primes set out with one rule, never destroy a planet with life,
translation.es: Los Primes tenían una regla: Nunca destruir un planeta con vida.

translation.en: until one of them tried to defy this rule.
translation.es: Pero uno trató de violar esa regla

translation.en: And his name forevermore was the Fallen.
translation.es: y su nombre se volvió para siempre El Caído.

translation.en: He despised the human race
and he wanted to kill you all by turning on that machine.
translation.es: ...y quería matarlos a todos encendiendo esa máquina.

translation.en: The only way to activate it is with a legendary key
translation.es: La única manera de activarla es con una llave legendaria

translation.en: called the Matrix of Leadership.
A great battle took place over possession of the Matrix.
translation.es: Hubo una gran batalla por la posesión de la Matriz.

translation.en: The Fallen was stronger than his brothers,
translation.es: El Caído era más fuerte que sus hermanos...

translation.en: so they had no choice but to steal and hide it from him.
translation.es: ...así que tuvieron que robarla y escondérsela.

translation.en: In the ultimate sacrifice, they gave their lives to seal the Matrix away
translation.es: Sacrificaron sus vidas para encerrar la Matriz para siempre

translation.en: in a tomb made of their very own bodies,
translation.es: en una tumba hecha con sus propios cuerpos.

translation.en: a tomb we cannot find.
translation.es: Una tumba que no podemos encontrar.

translation.en: Somewhere, buried in this desert, that deadly machine remains.
translation.es: En algún punto de este desierto yace escondida esa máquina mortal.

translation.en: The Fallen knows where it is
and if he finds the tomb of the Primes, your world will be no more.
translation.es: Si encuentra la tumba de los Primes, su mundo dejará de existir.

translation.en: Okay, so how do we stop him?
Only a Prime can defeat the Fallen.
translation.es: Solo un Prime puede vencer al Caído.

translation.en: Optimus Prime?
So, you've met a Prime?
Why, you must have met a great descendant.
translation.es: Debes de haber conocido a un gran descendiente.

translation.en: Is he alive, here on this planet?
He sacrificed himself to save me.
So, he's dead.
Without a Prime, it's impossible. No one else could stop the Fallen.
translation.es: Sin un Prime, es imposible. Nadie puede parar al Caído.

translation.en: So, the same energy that's gonna be used to reactivate the machine
translation.es: La misma energía que vuelve a activar a la máquina...

translation.en: could that energy somehow be used to reactivate Optimus and bring him back to life?
translation.es: ¿Podríamos usar esa energía para revivir a Prime?

translation.en: It was never designed for that purpose, but it's an energy like no other.
translation.es: No fue diseñada con ese fin, pero es una energía singular.

translation.en: So, then how do you get us to the Matrix before the Decepticons get to me?
translation.es: ¿Cómo nos llevas a la Matriz antes de que me agarren los decépticons?

translation.en: Follow your mind, your map, your symbols.
What you carved in the sand, it's your clue.
When dawn alights the Dagger's Tip, Three Kings will reveal the doorway.
translation.es: Cuando amanezca en la Punta de la Daga, Tres Reyes revelarán la entrada.

translation.en: Find the doorway.
Go now! Go!
That was my mission. It's your mission now.
translation.es: ¡Esa era mi misión! ¡Ahora es tu misión!

translation.en: Go before the Decepticons find me and find you.
translation.es: ¡Vete antes de que los decépticons nos encuentren a mí y a ti!

translation.en: Okay, here's what my CIA contact says.
translation.es: Mi contacto con la CIA dice lo siguiente.

translation.en: Ancient Sumerians used to call the Gulf of Aqaba the Dagger's Tip.
translation.es: Los sumerios llamaban al Golfo de Aqaba la Punta de la Daga.

translation.en: - That's the Dagger's Tip. - It's part of the Red Sea.
translation.es: - Es esa. - Es parte del Mar Rojo.

translation.en: It divides Egypt and Jordan like the tip of a blade.
translation.es: Divide Egipto y Jordania como la punta de un cuchillo.

translation.en: 29.5 degrees north, 35 east. Here it is.
First thing we've got to do is get Optimus to the Dagger's Tip.
translation.es: Tenemos que traer a Óptimus acá.

translation.en: How are you gonna get him halfway around the world?
I'm gonna make a call.
We got cops.
I can't go to prison, guys.

translation.en: There's got to be a way out of here!
translation.es: ¡Tiene que haber una manera de salir!

translation.en: Judy, get back, get back, get back.
Against the wall! Against the wall! Against the wall. Against the wall.
Bee! Bumblebee!
You get them somewhere safe, all right?
You've got to get in the car and get to safety.
translation.es: Suban al auto y busquen un lugar seguro.

translation.en: No, this isn't up for discussion!
- You're my son! - You're my son! - I know.
- Dad... - We all go together!
- Listen... - We're all going together!
Dad, stop, okay? Get in the car. He's gonna get you to safety.
translation.es: Para. Sube al auto. Él los llevará a un lugar seguro.

translation.en: You know, you run. You don't stop,
translation.es: Corre. ¡No pares y no te escondas!

translation.en: you don't hide, you run. You hear what I'm saying, okay? I'll find you when you're safe.
- No. - You've got to let me go, Dad.
translation.es: - ¡No! - Tienes que dejar que me vaya, papá.

translation.en: You have to let me go. You have to.
Ron. Ron, let him go.
You come back! Come on.
Ron! Mikaela! Mikaela!
- Go with my parents. - I'm not gonna go without you.
translation.es: - ¡Vete con ellos! - No puedo irme sin ti.

translation.en: Move to cover!
We got Jordanians!
We got help!
Down!
You okay, soldier?
We're gonna help you, soldier. Let's get these wounded clear of the bird.
translation.es: Te ayudaremos, soldado. Saquen a los heridos del helicóptero.

translation.en: Stay still. Stay still. Don't move.
You all right, young man? You have a radio?
Hey, kid, it's been nice knowing you. Remember what I did for my country.
translation.es: Fue un placer conocerte. Recuerda lo que hice por mi país.

translation.en: This is my moment.
You're crazy!
ETA to station, two minutes.
- Put it on the main screen. - Sir. Yes, sir.
translation.es: - Pónganlo en la pantalla principal. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: Predator 01.
Shit, it's a trick.
Commence Operation Firestorm. Send everyone.
translation.es: ¡Comiencen Tormenta de Fuego! Envíen a todos.

translation.en: Get those Marines on the ground. Roll in strike packages...
translation.es: - ¡Bajen a los marines! - Envíen paquetes de ataque.

translation.en: Task Force Ripper, execute Lightning.
Spotted Sam! IRONHIDE: Sam!
Ironhide!
Follow us to the pillars. We'll take you to Optimus.
Get out, Sam! Get to the pillars.
Let's go.
Oh, God. This is it. The pyramid's built right over the machine.
translation.es: Dios mío. La pirámide está construida sobre la máquina.

translation.en: If they turn that machine on, no more sun.
translation.es: Si prenden esa máquina, se acabó el sol.

translation.en: Not on my watch.
Not on my watch.
USS Stennis. Identify.
Where the hell are you? Watching the Weather Channel?
translation.es: ¿Dónde demonios está? ¿Viendo el canal del clima

translation.en: SportsCenter? I Dream of Jeannie or something?
We got 300 satellites up there. Where the hell are all our men?
translation.es: ¡Tenemos 300 satélites ahí arriba! ¿Dónde están nuestros hombres?

translation.en: Identify yourself.
What is your name, sailor?
Wilder, Captain of the USS John C. Stennis aircraft carrier.
translation.es: Wilder, capitán del portaaviones USS John C. Stennis.

translation.en: Okay, Captain Wilder.
This is Agent Seymour Simmons of Sector Seven.
translation.es: Yo soy el agente Seymour Simmons del Sector Siete.

translation.en: There is the mother of all non- biologicals
getting ready to blow up our sun.
translation.es: está a punto de destruir nuestro sol.

translation.en: Do you want to have a throwdown about my lack of clearance or do you want to help save a gazillion lives?
translation.es: ¿Quiere ponerse a discutir o salvar millones de vidas?

translation.en: All right, Agent Simmons. I'm listening.
translation.es: De acuerdo, agente Simmons. Lo escucho.

translation.en: Five clicks west of the Gulf,
translation.es: Cinco kilómetros al oeste del Golfo.

translation.en: we got ourselves an alien remodeling a pyramid.
translation.es: Un alienígena está remodelando una pirámide.

translation.en: Our one hope is a prototype weapon called a rail gun,
shoots a steel projectile at Mach 7. That's classified.
translation.es: - Dispara proyectiles de acero a Mach 7. - Eso es secreto.

translation.en: Don't talk to me about classified, all right?
Now, if you've got a battleship in the Gulf, which I know you do,
translation.es: Si tienen un buque de guerra en el Golfo, y sé que lo tienen,

translation.en: you tell them to ready that weapon!
Contact destroyer USS KIDD.
Alpha Team, flank left!
This way! Move it!
- Where do you need us, sir? - Protect those in line of fire.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde nos necesita, señor? - Protejan a los de la línea de fuego.

translation.en: Let's go! Go!
Give me your Comms. Come on. Epps!
Right now, we need air support, ASAP!
Have troops in contact 20 miles northwest. Radar contact.
translation.es: Tengo tropas en contacto 30 km al noroeste. Contacto radar.

translation.en: Proceed to 88 Alpha Sierra...
B- 1, snap 090.
You are approved to drop your 2,000- pound JDAMs.
translation.es: Puede soltar sus bombas de mil kilos.

translation.en: - What you got? - I couldn't get to them, sir.
translation.es: - ¿Qué cuentas? - ¡No los alcancé! Están a 600 metros y van a los pilares.

translation.en: They're 600 meters away and heading right for the pillars.
translation.es: Están a 600 metros y van a los pilares.

translation.en: All right. Precious cargo's coming!
Move!
Curse you!
Sam! Spotted Sam!
- Come on! - 2- 2 covering fire.
Two civilians, 12 o'clock!
Cover for us!
Hold the air strike! We're rescuing civilians!
Keep firing!
Come on! Mikaela!
Come on! Get in here!
Look who showed up.
You better have a good reason for us to be here.
translation.es: Ojalá tengas una buena razón para habernos traído.

translation.en: - Where's Optimus? - He's right over there, across the courtyard.
I got to get to him right now. Not with an air strike coming.
translation.es: - Tengo que ir. - Con el ataque aéreo, no.

translation.en: I have to get to him right now.
Go. Back, back, back, back.
- Go. - DECEPTICON: Listen up...
Okay.
Incoming!
Stick the landing.
Behold the glory of Jetfire!
Now let me show you how we brought the pain in my day!
translation.es: ¡Verán cómo infligíamos dolor en mis tiempos!

translation.en: I'm too old for this crap.
Keep going, man, 15 rounds of fighting.
translation.es: Sigue. Es una pelea de 15 asaltos.

translation.en: I am directly below the enemy's scrotum.
translation.es: Estoy directamente abajo del escroto del enemigo.

translation.en: 25.7 meters above sea level, 29.32 north.
translation.es: 25,7 metros arriba del nivel del mar, 29,32 norte.

translation.en: Kill track, 5205... Target acquired. Killing track.
translation.es: - Rielero, dispara. - Blanco en la mira.

translation.en: MAN ON PA: Two, one... Fire!
Yeah! Yeah!
B- 1's time on target, 30 seconds. 2,000- pound JDAMs inbound.
translation.es: B-1 a 30 segundos del blanco. Bombas de mil kilos llegando.

translation.en: We're gonna make a break through the B's on my command, okay?
You guys stick with me, you understand? You stay on my ass.
1- 1 tally orange smoke. I hope these F- 16s got good aim.
translation.es: - Viendo humo anaranjado. - Ojalá los F-16 tengan buen tino.

translation.en: Yeah? Why is that?
I told them to hit the orange smoke.
translation.es: Les dije que apuntaran al humo naranja.

translation.en: You mean that orange smoke?
It wasn't my best toss, okay?
Viper, thunder. Run!
Incoming!
Come on!
Sam!
Run!
Die!
Sam!
Hold your fire!
Sam!
Stay back! Mikaela, stay back!
Fucking do something!
Sam! Sam! Sam! Sam! Sam! Sammy! Sam!
- Let me go! - LENNOX: Come, you gotta move.
You got to move, come on. MEDIC: We got no pulse.
Starting CPR.
I have to see my kid! I got a son... Sammy!
Sam!
MEDIC 1: Clear. MEDIC 2: Ready to shock.
Clear! MEDIC 2: Ready to shock. One, two, three.
Do it again!
No!
Okay, listen to my voice. I love you and I need you.
translation.es: Escucha mi voz. Te amo y te necesito.

translation.en: Please. Please, come back to me. Sam, please!
I love you.
Where am I? Where am I? Am I dead? Am I dead?
We have been watching you a long, long time.
translation.es: Te hemos estado observando durante mucho, mucho tiempo.

translation.en: You have fought for Optimus, our last descendant,
translation.es: Has peleado por Óptimus, nuestro último descendiente,

translation.en: with courage and with sacrifice, the virtues of a leader,
translation.es: con valor y con sacrificios, las virtudes de un líder.

translation.en: a leader worthy of our secret.
translation.es: Un líder digno de nuestro secreto.

translation.en: The Matrix of Leadership is not found, it is earned.
translation.es: La Matriz del Liderazgo no se encuentra, se gana.

translation.en: Return now to Optimus.
Merge the Matrix with his spark.
translation.es: Une la Matriz con su chispa.

translation.en: It is, and always has been, your destiny.
translation.es: Ese es, y siempre ha sido tu destino.

translation.en: Sam!
I love you. I love you.
Boy, you returned for me.
A living Prime.
I don't believe it!
My Matrix!
Get up! Get up! Get up! Get up!
Get up, Prime!
Oh, no.
He's turning on the machine! You got to stop him! Get up!
translation.es: ¡Está activando la máquina! ¡Lo tienes que parar! ¡Levántate!

translation.en: Optimus!
Fallen, my master.
My brothers could not stop me from this.
translation.es: Mis hermanos no me pudieron detener.

translation.en: Yes, now I claim your sun.
Move! Enemy target, top of pyramid. Engage!
translation.es: - Muévanse. - ¡Blanco enemigo, cima de la pirámide!

translation.en: Engage! Engage!
In moments, we'll be at firing strength.
All my Decepticon life, I never did a thing worth doing until now.
translation.es: Como decépticon nunca hice nada que valiera la pena, hasta ahora.

translation.en: Optimus, take my parts
and you will have a power you've never known.
translation.es: y tendrás un poder que nunca has conocido.

translation.en: Fulfill your destiny.
Jolt! Electrify!
Transplant those afterburners.
Let's roll.
Fire mission on the pyramids.
This planet will be dark forever.
translation.es: Este planeta quedará en la oscuridad para siempre.

translation.en: Die, like your brothers!
They were your brothers, too.
Starscream!
You picked the wrong planet.
Give me your face.
I rise.
You fall.
No, no.
Not to call you a coward, Master,
translation.es: No es que quiera llamarlo cobarde, maestro,

translation.en: but sometimes cowards do survive.
translation.es: pero a veces los cobardes sobreviven.

translation.en: This isn't over.
It took all this for you to tell me that you love me.
translation.es: Necesitaste todo esto para decirme que me amabas.

translation.en: You said it first.
Thank you, Sam, for saving my life.
translation.es: Gracias, Sam, por salvarme la vida.

translation.en: Welcome.
Thank you for believing in me.
Our races united by a history long forgotten
translation.es: Nuestras razas unidas por una historia olvidada hace mucho tiempo

translation.en: and a future we shall face together.
translation.es: y un futuro que encararemos juntos.

translation.en: I am Optimus Prime,
and I send this message so that our
translation.es: y envío este mensaje para que nuestros pasados siempre sean recordados.

translation.en: pasts will always be remembered,
translation.es: para que nuestros pasados siempre sean recordados.

translation.en: for in those memories, we live on.
translation.es: Pues en esas memorias, seguimos vivos.

translation.en: So glad you could join us, Professor Einstein.
translation.es: Me da gusto verlo, profesor Einstein.

translation.en: Yeah, I was kind of busy.
Okay.
